data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Phnom Penh. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phnom Penh, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Phnom Penh, Cambodia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,254,624 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Vietnamese people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, let it be said of the 2,254,624 lost in Phnom Penh that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 47,076 believers in Phnom Penh, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Phnom Penh, Cambodia has a population of 2,301,700.

We estimate Phnom Penh has 47,076 people who might know Jesus, 31,961 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,222,663 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
